settings.richtext_content:
Buy in Bulk – Terms & Conditions

Save more when you shop in bulk with Teevoore! We offer exclusive discounts on bulk orders based on product type and total invoice value.

Who can order

Anyone, anywhere

Anyone from anywhere in the world can place a bulk order — we deliver globally.

Custom requests

Not on the site?

If you’ve seen a Teevoore product in our store or on social media that isn’t listed on the website, you can request it and we’ll do our best to arrange it for you.

Discounts

How discounts apply

Bulk discounts are calculated on the total invoice value, excluding shipping charges.

Timely delivery

On-time, wherever you are

Our team works to ensure your order arrives when and where you need it so you don’t miss important deadlines or events.

Returns

No returns on bulk orders

Please note: due to special volume pricing, bulk orders are non-returnable and non-refundable.

How to order

Contact us

Email us at info@teevoore.com with the following details:


• Full Name

• Email

• Phone Number

• Shipping Address

• List of products and quantities you’re interested in

Once we receive your request, our team will contact you with pricing and an estimated delivery timeline.

Payment

Prepaid orders only

All bulk orders must be paid in prepaid mode at the time of confirmation.

settings.title: FILL IN YOUR DETAILS BELOW
settings.subtitle: More pieces, more savings — gear up in Teevoore style.
settings.consent_text: I agree to the privacy policy and terms of service
